review: not a glowing recommendation genesis is really an acquired taste the core gameplay is very fun and im somebody who usually doesnt enjoy isometric dungeon crawlers good banter between the characters and some nice visual design   level design is weak and is what makes the game a repetitive slog too many levels are double the length they should be dont expect a substantial story either   get it cheap see if it clicks in the first 2 levels if not dont bother

darksiders genesis is the coop little sibling of the other darksiders games the fixed three quarters perspective and the level based structure make the game feel smaller in scope and the zoomed out camera seems a little bit at odds with the extremely busy character designs  the main problem is that darksiders genesis doesnt offer much beyond combat and the designs of the combat encounters arent really interesting enough to sustain a 15 hour game
